name: Cubon
description:
Cubon is a casual platform and puzzle game where you have to find your place in the world. Jump, open doors, and find your way through each level. But watch out! Everywhere you go, you'll leave a trace behind you, making it impossible for you to go back to the same place again.



You play as Cubon, a small cube that is searching for its place in the world. Everything is made out of cubes, yet Cubon can't seem to find where it fits in. During its journey, Cubon will have to solve puzzles and gain new powers to progress.

While moving, Cubon leaves behind a path of deadly cubes, so it must be careful about the path it takes in order to solve the puzzles.

There are 13 levels with 4 different unique atmospheres and game mechanics to navigate through.
